Class InventoryGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
InventoryGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Inventory.InventoryObserver, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class InventoryGUI extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane implements Inventory.InventoryObserver
Class used to create, implement, visualize and set the inventory's behavior

  • Property Summary
